mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(user_id, movie_id, movie_name, theater_name, syg_id, seat, reserve_date, sangyoung_time, tf, pay_id, ticket_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{movieId}, #{movieName}, #{theaterName}, #{sygId}, #{seat}, #{reserveDate}, #{sangyoungTime}, 't', #{payId}, #{ticketId})

INSERT INTO pay(pay_id, user_id, pay_date, howmany, point, usepoint, total_price, movie_id, ticket_id, movie_name) VALUES (#{payId}, #{userId}, #{payDate}, #{howmany}, #{point}, #{usepoint}, #{totalPrice}, #{movieId}, #{ticketId}, #{movieName})
mapper.update: update time set reserve_seats=#{strSeats} where time_num=#{timeNum}
update member set point=#{usepoint} where user_id=#{userId}
